sparked by the revolt. Zahi Hawass , minister of state for antiquities, said a statue of boy king Tutankhamun and several other ancient treasures had been stolen from the museum. The missing objects include a gilded wood statue of the 18th Dynasty king Tutankhamun being carried by a goddess and parts of another statue showing him harpooning, he said.
